body: Btw the dude's name is 良男 Yoshio. But, if you read the kanji seperatedly, it can be read as Good Man
Part two is surprisingly sol!? And here I wanted a proper NTR lol

In this episode, when Ayumi asks her boyfriend what he wants for birthday present, he asks for her homemade cooking. Problem, she can't cook. So, she asks Yoshio's help to teach her. In exchange, he asks her to do Polynesian sex, teasing each other without actually doing sex until the 5th day. In the end, it does feels good for both (both really can't take it anymore at the last day). They did it all night, and she can't make it in time to cook for her boyfriend. Luckily, her sex friend had prepared boxed meal, and the boyfriend happily eats all of it. From the extra page, seems like she still can't cook, and her sex friend is the one who had to eat all the failed experiments.

@jeonsann: this is continuation of #352652. Ayumi, the protagonist in this story, is a popular girl. She has a boyfriend (Yamashita) and their relationship has been going well. Despite seemingly perfect, she is quite clumsy, and also curious about sex (she did invite her boyfriend to her home while her parents are away overseas, but he turns down the offer). When she got home, her childhood friend Yoshio is there. Her parents asks him to accompany her as leaving their daughter alone is too dangerous. Also, Yoshio could help with her study (she's not exactly bright either). Yoshio had sex while she's asleep (no confirmation, but he might have drugged her asleep), but she's also turned on to his body earlier anyway. They ends up having sex all night. Also, Yoshio is transferring to her school.
She looks like too dumb to know that that cheating is a sin
@Fucked up day It's up to you
Umm... Am i supposed to get mad or smt?

Her body feels good? Really need more background story on them. Ayumi and Yoshio knew each other long time ago (10 years ago). At least, he doesn't seem to treat her like trash to play until she breaks (after all, her parents also trust him to accompany her while they're away). Although not much, they also got other thing to do together rather than just sex for 24 hours. At this point, it's probably more like she's dating two guys.
